name: device_move
description: This function is used to move a SmartThings device to a specified location.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is currently located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is currently located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to move.

parameters.name: rvcLocation
parameters.description: The location to which the device should be moved.

parameters.name: rvcObject
parameters.description: The object to which the device should be moved.
